TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示 中包含的 Windows 进度栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是进行承载而优化。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 托管的控件的属性和事件的一个子集公开在级别，但基础控件是完全可通过访问属性。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. A控件直观指示较长的操作的进度。A control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation. 控件将显示在填充从左到右，系统突出颜色显示操作进度栏。The control displays a bar that fills in from left to right with the system highlight color as an operation progresses. > [!NOTE] > 控件只能是水平方向。The control can only be oriented horizontally. 控件通常用于应用程序执行任务，例如将文件复制或打印文档时。The control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents. 应用程序的用户可以考虑应用程序停止响应，如果没有视觉提示。Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue. 使用通知用户应用程序正在执行较长任务和应用程序是否仍然响应。Use the to notify the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding. 和属性定义值来表示任务的进度的范围。The and properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task. 属性通常设置为零，值与属性通常设置为一个值，该值的任务完成。The property is typically set to a value of zero, and the property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task. 例如，若要复制的文件，一组时正确显示进度属性无法设置为的文件总数，要复制。For example, to display the progress properly when copying a group of files, the property could be set to the total number of files to be copied. 属性表示应用程序已完成该操作的进度。The property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation. 因为在控件中显示的栏，块的集合的值将显示通过仅仅是近似于属性的当前值。Because the bar displayed in the control is a collection of blocks, the value displayed by the only approximates the property's current value. 基于大小、属性确定何时将显示下一个块。Based on the size of the , the property determines when to display the next block. 有多种方法可以修改所显示的值以外更改直接属性。There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the other than changing the property directly. 你可以使用属性来指定特定值要递增属性，，然后调用方法值增量。You can use the property to specify a specific value to increment the property by, and then call the method to increment the value. 若要更改增量值，可以使用方法并指定的增量值属性。To vary the increment value, you can use the method and specify a value by which to increment the property. 替换较旧控件，将仍然保留为了向后兼容。 replaces the older control, which is nevertheless retained for backward compatibility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示，可计算斐波那契数字序列。The following code example demonstrates a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. summary.span: 按指定的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够通过特定量递增的值的进度栏。The method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount. 此方法的递增进度栏是类似于使用具有属性方法。This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the property with the method. 属性指定的当前位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果是，在调用方法，属性大于的值属性，属性的值将保持属性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果是，在调用一个含有负值中指定的方法`value`参数，属性小于的值属性，属性仍然保持为值属性。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示每次 显示更新之间的延迟（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value representing the delay between each display update, in milliseconds.

value.span: 表示延迟的一个整数（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: An integer representing the delay, in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置显示更新的延迟。The property gets or sets the delay of display update. 因此，在降低的值属性、 动画增加的速度。Therefore, as you decrease the value of the property, the speed of the animation increases.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Maximum : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为此 定义的范围上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the upper bound of the range that is defined for this .
An integer representing the upper bound of the range.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的上限属性。This property specifies the upper limit of the property. 时的值属性更改，重绘控件以反映新控件的范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 时的值属性等于的值完全填充属性，进度栏。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is completely filled. 你可以使用此属性指定一个值，属性必须设置为 (通过设置属性或使用或方法) 来指示操作已完成。You can use this property to specify a value that the property must be set to (by setting the property or using the or methods) to indicate that an operation is complete. 例如，你可以设置的值属性设置为的文件复制操作中的文件总数。For example, you can set the value of the property to the total number of files in a file copy operation. 复制文件时，每次属性可以逐个增加，直到复制的文件总数。Each time a file is copied, the property can be increased by one until the total number of files is copied. 此时，将完全填充进度栏。At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用中的属性，可计算斐波那契数字序列。The following code example demonstrates a use of the property in a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例提供，供类。This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#2)]

An integer representing the lower bound of the range.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的下限属性。This property specifies the lower limit of the property. 时的值属性更改，重绘控件以反映新控件的范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 时的值属性等于的值属性，进度栏为空。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is empty. 若要更改进度栏的值，使用具有属性方法，请使用方法，或设置的值直接属性。To change the value of the progress bar, use the property with the method, use the method, or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用中的属性，可计算斐波那契数字序列。The following code example demonstrates a use of the property in a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例提供，供类。This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 按照 属性的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将进度栏的值递增所指定的量属性。The method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the property. 你可以使用属性指定在操作中的每个已完成的任务的进度栏的值更改量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 例如，如果您要复制的一组文件，你可能想要设置的值属性设置为 1 和的值属性设置为要复制的文件总数。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 复制每个文件后，你可以调用方法的值增加进度栏属性。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果你想要更灵活地控制进度栏的值，则可以使用方法设置的值或直接属性。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. 属性指定的当前位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果是，在调用方法，属性大于的值属性，属性的值将保持属性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果是，在调用一个含有负值中指定的方法`value`参数，属性小于的值属性，属性仍然保持为值属性。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the layout is right-to-left or left-to-right when the property is set to .

value.span: 若要在 属性设置为 时打开镜像并从右向左为控件布局，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to turn on mirroring and lay out control from right to left when the property is set to ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制从右到左编写语言所采用的国际应用程序的布局。Use the property to control the layout of international applications in which the language is written from right to left. 当属性是`true`，和属性设置为、 将在 Windows 窗体和控件放置上启用镜像和文本将从右到左。When the property is `true`, and the property is set to , mirroring will be enabled on the Windows form and control placement and text will be from right to left.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripProgressBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripProgressBar1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
